The Phoenix is Fun and Comfortable####[]
My wife and I have stayed at the Phoenix some ten times in the past four years, with and without our kids.####[]
We like its quirky, clean rooms, friendly employees, and proximity to our favorite restaurants and live music venues.####[]
The neighborhood is indeed sketchy, but we never have problems getting taxi cabs, either through the front desk or by simply standing on the corner outside the hotel.####[]
The parking is a convenient bonus - right in front of the hotel where it should be.####[]

Warm memories of Hotel David####[]
We had a very nice stay for Christmas 2008 at the Hotel David in Florence, Italy.####[]
The staff's hospitality, the warmth of the hotel all decorated for Christmas, the happy hour next to the fireplace, the spacious clean rooms and wonderful freshly baked pastries for breakfast and Christmas Eve, all contributed to a very memorable visit to Florence.####[]
I highly recommend the hotel.####[]
You will be lucky if, at the height of the season, you manage to book a room in this hotel!I give it a rating of excellent for our overall experience.####[]
Beware of leaving cash in the gift shop for postage.####[]
Very pleasant experience with one exception .####[['NULL', 'hotel general', 'positive', 'Very pleasant experience']]
The gift shop stated they out of postage and if I would leave cash, the stamps would be purchased at the post office and my post cards would be mailed for me.####[]
I had a number of cards and left the saleslady approximately equivalent of $14+ US dollars for the postage.####[]
While cards mailed from other locations across China, arrived at their destinations, not one of the cards left in the hotel gift shop were ever received.####[]

Difficult to find fault####[]
The Barcelona Universal is not the largest hotel, or the best equipped or in the best location####[]
but it did offer friendly and efficient service, a very modern and up to date decor, large and comfortable rooms, all in a convenient location close to the centre and right next to a metro and bus stops.####[]
The Universal gave us everything we needed for a weeks sightseeing in Barcelona :####[]
Breakfast that ran till 11.00am just in case we'd had a late night, a sun terrace on the roof with a (small) pool and gymnasium, although we didnt try the restaurant in the evenings preferring to enjot Barcelonas excellent nightlife.####[]
Its great value for money and if you are looking for a safe bet, with good service and a convenient location look no further####[]

We got a really nice , recently refurbished twin room for only 99 Euro ( booked direct on the hotels website )  . However , rather large negative :####[['room', 'rooms general', 'positive', 'really nice'], ['room', 'rooms design_features', 'positive', 'recently refurbished']]
A few weeks later , having been so impressed by the hotel that I was planning a second trip back there to stay with my husband , I was told by the hotel that it had just been upgraded from a 3 * to a 4 * hotel and that subsequently the price has increased from 99 Euros for a Classic room to 169 Euros !####[['hotel', 'hotel prices', 'negative', 'price has increased from 99 Euros for a Classic room to 169 Euros']]
A huge increase which dramatically changes the ' value for money ' aspect of the hotel .####[['hotel', 'hotel prices', 'negative', "dramatically changes the 'value for money' aspect"]]
While I would agree that an increase was warranted based on the refurbishment , it does not warrant a 70 Euro increase and it ' s a real shame as it puts a nice little hotel in the unaffordable category for a lot of people who would previously have stayed here ( a comment I made to the hotel )  .####[['hotel', 'hotel prices', 'negative', 'unaffordable category']]

Excellent hotel in central Beijing Had an excellent stay at the Wangfujing Grand.####[]
At check-in, the clerk asked me if I wanted to stay in an improved room (at a higher rate of course).####[]
I declined and was upgraded into an executive suite, which gave me access to the executive lounge and breakfast.####[]
The staff at the hotel were excellent, always available and courteous.####[]
The hotel is well situated, within walking distance of the forbidden city.####[]
Plenty of restaurants in the area.####[]
Friendly, quirky and great location Rooms are nice but small.####[]
If you are a couple with a lot of luggage, you will be wondering where to put it with just 2 drawers and a narrow wardrobe in our Queen room.####[]

The quirky object in the mini bar cupboard gave me an hilarious taking point at the conference I was attending at the Westin nearby.####[]
Easy walk to the shops, Pike Place market etc a real plus.####[]

Fine Hotel in rather an unusual setting Finding this hotel in the midst of a rather run down area of Barcelona was a bit of a disappointment, but as we explored we found we could walk to the sea in 10 minutes, and to Port Vell via the promenade in 20minutes, which improved the whole situation.####[]
The hotel is really quite plush, the rooms had everything we needed, and we were impressed to find that soft drinks in room fridge were replaced daily free!####[]
The staff were very helpful, and knowledgeable about Barcelona and where to go.####[]
The only possible discontent was that breakfast was definitely better some days than others,but the Menu del Dia which started badly improved rapidly each day, and at 18 euros for 3 courses plus a bottle of wine , and a bottle of water, wasn't to be turned down.####[]
It is definitely a hotel I would visit again, particularly as we now understand that the whole area will be refurbished over the next couple of years.####[]

Avoid the Radisson Waikiki Prince Kuhio####[]
Due to renovations 3 of the 5 elevators in this high rise hotel are out of service and have been since October, 2004.####[]
It is an average 10 minute wait to get an elevator.####[]
The rooms and bathrooms are small, worn and quite dirty, especially under the beds.####[]
The rooms are noisy from hall, adjoining room and street noise.####[]
The hotel fronts Kuhio which is heavily trafficked, noisy and hard to turn into.####[]
The Muse is pure perfection...####[]
My husband and I just returned from a four night stay at The Muse.####[]
The service we received at the hotel was superb.####[]
The staff was courteous and attentive, the hotel is extremely clean, loved the decor, all new interiors, great location, the bed was extraordinarily comfortable and there were so many other special touches that made our stay truly unforgettable.####[]
We highly recommend The Muse.####[]

Great, eccentric but click hotel####[]
I read one of the below reviews expecting the dylan to be past its prime after the changeover from ANoushka Hempel, shabby rooms, etc but was very pleasantly surprised.####[]
I went to amsterdam, a city i love and have visited many times for work and for pleasure, with a new partner - we were really surprised by the polite and professional (not at all snobby) service, great room service, great cocktails in the bar, and best of all, a great room.####[]
Booked a cheap (?30) rate off the internet and was expecting a broom closet, but the room was very nice, large (by Amsterdam standards), loads of character, clean, kept-up-looking, just very very cool.####[]
I'd not hesitate to recommend the dylan especially as there are not too many options in AMsterdam for characterful, stylish hotels.####[]

Great amenities for the price####[['Great amenities', 'room_amenities prices', 'positive', 'price']]
If you want a first class or corporate hotel in a nondescript cityscape, then stay away from the Perak, instead book at one of the glass and concrete boxes on Orchard Road.####[]
The Perak is not like the big chain hotels but is a great value for the money in Singapore .####[['The Perak', 'hotel prices', 'positive', 'great value for the money']]

Great hotel and great staff####[]
I stayed at this hotel this weekend and was really pleased I chose the hotel.####[]
The staff were all very friendly and helpful, all the staff could speak English (and were happy to), the location was perfect and the room was exceptionally quiet considering it was on a main road.####[]
The only down side to the hoetl was the size of the room.####[]
We stayed in a standard room and even though it was big enough for us it would have been nicer to have a slightly larger room.####[]
I would certainly return to this hotel if I return to Paris, the staff certainly and location certainly made a difference.####[]

Not all rooms are up to par I am a regular guest at Hilton-family properties, and although there were some nice aspects of my Mar 27th stay, it was hardly worth the price paid.####[]
Good points: very friendly staff, and terrific restaurantBad points:####[]
the room was dated - old rundown furniture, warped bathtub, stained bedding.####[]
I was only offered a double-queen suite in the main building, which seems to be the issue - apparently there are much better rooms available - so be careful when making arrangements.####[]
Overall, I've had much better accomodations at Embassy Suites and Doubletrees in the hilton family.####[]
Next time, I would stay elsewhere in the area, and just drive over to dine at the Different Pointe of View restaurant.####[]

Only blip in our stay was having one 50 euro note lifted from my wallet and one 20 Euro note lifted from my wife's purse while we were at breakfast and the room was being cleaned.####[]
Obviously we shouldn't have left the money in the room, but my issue was with the attitude of the hotel who rather than express any concern simply refused to accept that it could possibly have been their cleaner and must have been an opportunist thief come in from the street.####[]
Quite a strange thief - goes up to the third floor of a small hotel, sneaks into a small room without the cleaner in the room seeing him and then takes one note from each of two purses/wallets, leaving loads of other notes behind and returning the purse and wallet to the pockets of clothes in the room.####[]
The hotel (and cleaner) were no doubt banking (correctly) that we wouldn't bother wasting half a day of a two day trip to Barcelona at the police station!####[]

John And Nessie on Our Honeymoon####[]
We arrived Tuesday afternoon on our honeymoon to be greeted by very friendly staff , we had lovely fresh fruit brought to the room on arrival , we asked to change the room for one where we could see and hear the sea , no problem , very helpfull .####[['staff', 'service general', 'positive', 'helpfull']]
The beach is supurb ( Like the bounty advert ) lovely warm sea , very safe to wonder around , plenty of sun loungers , and parasoles for shade , the food is very good plenty of choice , breezes is a very clean and kept clean hotel the staff are very pleasent and very helpful , We would recommend taking a box of PG tips and a couple of bars of Cadburys and any other required pleasures , that can ' t be bought out there , you will be ripped off buying things in the hotel .####[['food', 'food_drinks style_options', 'positive', 'good'], ['hotel', 'hotel cleanliness', 'positive', 'clean'], ['staff', 'service general', 'positive', 'very pleasent and very helpful']]
The country side is very plush and green breath taking scenery and well worth taking an excursion out and experiencing the local culture .####[['NULL', 'hotel general', 'positive', 'NULL']]
To sum up we had the most wonderful time and highly recommend a visit .####[['NULL', 'hotel general', 'positive', 'wonderful']]

We wanted a good downtown location so opted for the Pulitzer .####[['location', 'location general', 'positive', 'good']]
The room we were given was overlooking the inner garden , which was perfectly nice and quiet .####[['room', 'rooms general', 'positive', 'nice'], ['room', 'rooms miscellaneous', 'positive', 'nice']]
Whilst we have seen bigger rooms in luxury hotels in the US and Far East , for European standards it was of a good size and very ell apointed and functional , something you don ' t see everywhere .####[['rooms', 'rooms design_features', 'positive', 'good'], ['NULL', 'hotel general', 'positive', 'NULL']]
Since the weather was so good lunch and dinner were served in the garden as well ( which we didnt join since we had other plans )  . Staff , especially porters and concierge , were extremely helpful in assisting with our plans , which were disrupted due to a rail strike on the first day of our stay .####[['NULL', 'food_drinks style_options', 'positive', 'good'], ['NULL', 'service general', 'positive', 'helpful']]

It did have a little sitting area , with two chairs and a table , but the beds were rock hard ( you want to ease down on them gently , lest you break a body part )  .####[['NULL', 'room_amenities design_features', 'negative', 'NULL'], ['NULL', 'facilities general', 'positive', 'NULL']]
The air conditioning was non - operative during our very warm stay in early - mid May ( the screenless window opened , however )  , the TV remote control did not work , although there was an attempt to repair it , and a spare blanket taken out of its plastic wrap in the closet smelled so musty that it needed to be replaced -  - and was , with one that smelled somewhat less musty .####[['air conditioning', 'room_amenities quality', 'negative', 'non-operative'], ['TV remote control', 'room_amenities quality', 'negative', 'did not work']]

Divine!####[]
This hotel , with its immaculately clean and well - fitted rooms , situated at the southern end of the Ponte Vecchio in Florence , is the perfect base for any holiday in this extraordinarily beautiful , safe and secure city .####[['hotel', 'hotel cleanliness', 'positive', 'immaculately clean'], ['rooms', 'rooms quality', 'positive', 'well']]
The staff are unfailingly courteous and helpful , the service is splendid , however what really sets this hotel apart from the rest####[['service', 'service general', 'positive', 'splendid']]

Give It A Miss####[]
The hotel is in a great location, but I would have serious doubts in recommending the hotel as there are several deficiencies that need immediate attention.####[]
Hotel is in need of some seious maintenance i.e. broken counter tops, leaking taps, no self closing room doors, window locks not working and musty stench from stairwells.####[]
There is no parking at the hotel and runs $18 - $25 per day plus tax.####[]
No High Speed Internet access at all is available, you have to cross the road to a sister property's lobby and pay $10 a day.####[]

and we ' ll like to recommend everybody who wants a great time , to choose this resort .####[['resort', 'hotel general', 'positive', 'like to recommend']]
No complains , everything was perfect , nice people , great entertainment .####[['NULL', 'hotel general', 'positive', 'perfect'], ['NULL', 'hotel general', 'positive', 'No complains'], ['people', 'service general', 'positive', 'nice'], ['NULL', 'hotel miscellaneous', 'positive', 'great entertainment']]
All of you who we'll go there enjoy every moment!####[]
left hand doesn't know what right is doing Desk clerks were not helpful as they should of been in getting the type of room we had booked 4 month's in advance.####[]
The maids and baggage handlers were very courteous and helpful.####[]
Ricky was the only desk clerk who seemed to know what he was doing.####[]
The pool was closed the three nights we were there with promises that it would open very soon.####[]
Double room which we did not book was much nicer than the two queen bed room we did book.####[]
Good choice We stayed in this hotel when we travelled to Frankfurt to watch the World Cup .####[['hotel', 'hotel general', 'positive', 'Good choice']]
The hotel is in a good , central location .####[['hotel', 'location general', 'positive', 'good, central location']]
It is close to the main shopping district and about 10 - 15 minutes walk away from the main square and the main restaurants area .####[['NULL', 'location general', 'positive', 'close to the main shopping district'], ['NULL', 'location general', 'positive', '10-15 minutes walk away from the main square']]
There are plenty of nice little restaurants right next to the hotel though .####[['hotel', 'location general', 'positive', 'plenty of nice little restaurants right next']]
This is very much a business hotel with a clean , sophisticated reception area , very professional staff and good sized modern rooms and bathrooms .####[['hotel', 'hotel cleanliness', 'positive', 'clean'], ['reception area', 'facilities design_features', 'positive', 'sophisticated'], ['staff', 'service general', 'positive', 'very professional'], ['rooms', 'rooms design_features', 'positive', 'good sized modern'], ['bathrooms', 'rooms design_features', 'positive', 'good sized modern']]
We booked well in advance on the hotel ' s website and were able to get the room for a very cheap rate - especially considering this is a four star hotel and the City was hosting the World Cup !####[['room', 'rooms prices', 'positive', 'very cheap rate'], ['hotel', 'hotel general', 'positive', 'especially considering this is a four star']]
Loved the hotel I stayed at a small single room without bath/toilet.####[]
Even though I had to share a bathroom, it was very clean and always available because it was shared only between me and a person staying at the next single room.####[]
The hotel staff were very helpful and charming.####[]
Location was good too.####[]
It was close enough to walk from tube, bus stops and Victoria station.####[]
I do recommend this hotel to everyone.####[]

Great hotel - would recommend to anyone We stayed on the 14th floor at this hotel for 6 nights in November 2006 and have to say it was excellent.####[]
The accom are apartments, very modern and large.####[]
Our apartment had a large lounge area, kitchen and dining area, a large bedroom with loads of wardrobe space, a modern large bathroom with shower and bath and there was a washer and dryer in a cupboard.####[]
The furniture and fittings were really lovely.####[]
The tower itself is close to Darling Harbour and was central for the shops, ferries, and buses.####[]
